title: Ukraine urged to protect religious freedom in wartime
content: Zelensky and his people are heroes in resisting Russia but Ukraine must not sacrifice freedoms in wartime, a champion of religious liberty has urged

title: Scientists discover hidden 140,000 year old city at bottom of ocean
content: The amazing discovery could rewrite the story of human origins.

title: Ukraine 'tries to kill Putin' by downing his helicopter in Russia war zone mission
content: Ukraine launched repeated military drone attacks at the moment when Vladimir Putin made a rare visit close to the war zone, a Russian major-general says.

title: The two European cities 'bigger' than London - number one has 3 million more people
content: Both cities home over 10 million residents in their whole urban areas.

title: The ancient mega-city in Europe that's one of the hottest in the world with 40C heat

title: Archaeologists make terrifying discovery inside ancient Mayan 'Blood Cave'
content: Research shows some of the bones, which include a child's hip, were struck with a hatchet-like tool.

title: Ukraine LIVE: NATO war jets scramble as Putin's forces shoot kids and plane of tourists
content: Poland's military high command announced it had "activated all available forces and resources" on NATO's eastern flank.

title: I live in a van in a Tenerife car park because tourists have sent rents sky high

title: Archaeology breakthrough as 5,000-year-old finding boosts 'Atlantis of the Sands' myth
content: A desert in the Middle East was thought to be a vast stretch of sand void of life - until the discovery of a 5,000-year-old city.

title: Tiny island that looks like Mars becoming new celeb hotspot
content: A small island in Hawaii is becoming the new go-to destination for American celebs.
